reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location: Its a bit out of the centre but still quite near. Area not as bad as it first looks as lots of Lisbon is quite run down. 1 minute from the metro.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, lacks attention to detail, service not bad, area not great
Nice hotel, not so nice surroundings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms: Not bad. Horrible furniture. Huge lovely bathroom. Rooms overlooking garden very peaceful.
reviews.title: Just go to this hotel! i'm serious :)

likes.disliked: — You have to pay 7euro's per hour to get acces to the wifi in your room

reviews.title: loved that place and very nice staff!
reviews.text: Staff: Mostly helpful expect one who didnt take his eyes off the TV
